item.title: Telangana: Tribal Woman Gang Raped in Medak, Dies
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: A tribal woman who went to a local labour adda was promised daily-wage work, taken to a farm, gangraped her and left her for dead in Medak district. The accused hung her from a tree and escaped. The victim died later at a hospital. According to the Kulcharam police registered a case of rape and murder the accused and launched a search operation to catch them.
Police said the woman had gone to the labour adda with her husband. He was engaged to work in Gadwal and left. Hours later, pe...]]>
